thread.section_title: Trusted Translations, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Trusted Translations, Inc. | www.trustedtranslations.com
thread.title: Tara H.
thread.title_full: Trusted Translations, Inc. reviewed by Tara H.

author: Tara H.
title: Tara H.
text: We are based in Switzerland but had a meeting in Miami that we required a translator for. We contacted Trusted Tranlations and Kevin Bathke from Trusted Translations got in touch with us. He was phenomenally fast at responding, very professional and always available to answer any queries we had. The service was efficient, very well organised and from the moment we first communicated with Kevin to the end of our meeting accompanied by our translator, we felt we were in good hands. The translator was also Professional and exaclty what we had hoped for - we would absolutely recommend Trusted Translations and would not hesitate in using them again.
